summary: The diff implements all seven requirements (REQ-8 through REQ-14) with strong coverage. REQ-8 (logo), REQ-9 (premium design), REQ-10 (reward probabilities), REQ-11 (claim form), REQ-12 (backend), REQ-13 (confirmation), and REQ-14 (admin panel) are all present. One minor gap exists: REQ-12 specifies a query method to retrieve a single submission by coupon code, and while getSubmission exists in the backend, the admin panel uses searchByCouponPrefix for coupon search rather than an exact lookup â€” but the method itself is present. Overall implementation is thorough with a few minor hallucinated extras not requested by the spec.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend method updateRewardAmount that allows updating the reward amount of an existing submission
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement asked for updating a submission's reward amount after it was created. REQ-12 only specifies submit, getAll, and getByCode.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend method filterByState that returns all submissions filtered by state
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement requested server-side filtering by state. REQ-14 only required filtering/searching by coupon code.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend method getRewardStats returning total count and reward amounts array
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement explicitly requested a dedicated reward stats query method on the backend. REQ-14 asked for stats in the admin panel, which could be computed client-side from getAllSubmissions.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend migration module with a run function for schema migration
hallucinated_features.reason: No requirement requested a migration system or module for the Motoko backend.
